Introduction
This topic contains information on benefit-specific eligibility factors, including
screening an original application for basic eligibility
requirement for Social Security numbers (SSNs)
eligibility determinations for
compensation
pension
survivors benefits
, and
related benefits
, and
eligibility for Chapter 18 benefits
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B - Screening Applications for Benefit Eligibility
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
